name: Video2sound2video2sound2video2sound2video2sound2video
tagline: color video to stereo audio signal to color video / host2host
body:
SLOEV WAREZ PRESENTS:
a dagger in the heart of humanity!

basically it takes a video, or webcam if you modify it a little, and scans it progressively then sends its pixels grey color values over the dac. then the receiver takes audio from the adc and with same buffer size turns it into video again. it works offer speakers and mics as well.

open with pd-extended
[![lulz](http://img.youtube.com/vi/022Zz-guWrU/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=022Zz-guWrU)

check it out at:
b&w:
https://vimeo.com/67208033
forum post:
http://puredata.hurleur.com/viewtopic.php?pid=37039#p37039
color video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VZOOO4I29Sg
feedback:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=022Zz-guWrU
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
